scripts.devNotWatch: npm run clearDist && npx tsc && npm run start
scripts.buildSequelize: npx rimraf --glob dist-sequelize-cjs/server/ && npx tsc --project tsconfig.sequelize.json && node -e "require('fs').writeFileSync('./dist-sequelize-cjs/package.json', JSON.stringify({type: 'module'}))"
scripts.migrations: npm run buildSequelize && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate
scripts.migrationsUndoAll: npm run buildSequelize && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all
scripts.seeders: npm run buildSequelize && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
